snippet.title: Assetto Corsa EVO Announcement Trailer [PEGI]
snippet.description:
Car passion is a state of mind and it's driven by heart!

Assetto Corsa EVO: the next step in the evolution of Assetto Corsa.

Early Access starts 16th January 2025

Wishlist now on Steam

https://505.games/ACEVOAnnounce

Special thanks to our partners for their support in the creation of this trailer:

PORSCHE,
ALFA ROMEO, 
Rseat, 
BBRModelStore, 
Bell Helmets, 
OMP Racing,
Ford Motor Company

Soundtrack provided by Pond5.
